It was no comfort that feminisation was meant to come with an enhanced libido, and reduced IQ. Both meant to be comforting to those who failed their suitability exams, and as a promise to greater submissiveness towards her superior, both physically and mentally.

Controlling your breathing, you go back over the answers, double-checking them, and calming yourself.

Your name at the top: Jack Brockman. Your Class: Class IVb.

- - - - -

Half an hour into the exam, a sobbing Robin Johnson had been lead from the exam hall. Nerves getting too much for him. Even as he'd tried to cling to his desk, to demand the right to sit the exam, his voice was cracking, and his fingers shook, unable to lift his pen, let alone write with it.

He'd been half-carried from the hall. His crack-up dooming him, his lack of confidence, and automatic 0% in the exam making his conversion into a Joy Girl, or a Meter Maid a virtual certainty.

With selective breeding, women's bodies had been enhanced, from an average B-cup, over two hundred years, to a minimum D-cup. It had come with a price. The government IQ tests, confirmed that women had now been bred into a more docile, less intelligent partner for man. The difference wasn't huge, wasn't definitive, but after the nanite revolution. Well, the natural born girls were proud of their intelligence, and more modest bodies.

The converted, were more sexual, with both their demands, and their needs. Their intelligence was markedly poorer, and that had felt like a kindness. But as you scan your answers, you can't help but imagine failing, you can't help but imagine the conversion, the feel of satin panties caressing your fuller, plumper rear. The cradling of your new bust, and the tickling caress as a mane of long curls cascades down your spine.



You feel an unwanted erection, at the image. Not of your transformation, you tell yourself. But of the staggering beauty, of how near to reality she is. Once you pass. Yes! You have to know you'll pass.

Looking off into the distance, you try to reign your thoughts in. You don't want to be hiding a stiffy, as you leave the hall behind.
151.title: Jack was sitting his exams.

choices: Watching the notice board, more names fill it, more name above you.
You watch, as more finish the exam. Thankfully your score stays high up.

1513.content:
The computer scanned his paper, and marked it as a pass. You wanted to punch the air in relief. The feelings of unfairness faded quickly, and you once more felt the government were making the right choice, the difficult choice.

After the virus had wiped out, the women with smaller busts. The virus seemed to vary it's vector across ethnicities and nationalities. However, in the West, most women with less than a D-cup were afflicted. Their deaths ripping a huge hole in the various country's demographics.

Thankfully, nanites were developed enough to convert some of the men into women. Some attempt had to be made to restore a balance, to restore the population numbers. The ones selected for conversion, who failed the exam were enhanced. Both their beauty, and their fertility. A move that pleased both the men, and the natural born women, who wanted to be seen as somehow purer. That wanted to be seen less as sexual conquests.

The chosen few, (well, not so few), usually had busts that shimmied and shook, enhanced with extra muscle for firmness and to ease the pain of their size, their unrelenting weight. Few of the new girls had busts beneath an FF-cup. With some receiving figures that only existed in fantasy before.

There were changes to the prison system too. Naturally, the murderers and rapists were converted, without mercy, without any other option.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/67d36b9480d9...

Their boosted hormones ensuring their submissiveness, and obedience to any and all authority.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/23a37e2b181b...

It was generally, the rapists who ended up with the most extreme of bodies. Their brains merely along for the ride, with their baser instincts in charge.

A few of the murderers tried to complain when they found their new bodies. Arguing that they'd be mistaken as rapists.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/508f4af2bc6c...

However, the were told the changes were irreversible, and with a tweak, and caress they were introduced to how responsive their bodies were to the least stimulation.

- - - - -

However, despite your growing calm, and assurance, you know you also need to be in the top 25% of the class. You look around the rest of the room, assessing their chances of passing, their chances of surpassing you. With a fail guaranteeing conversion, you have passed the first hurdle, soon you'll have some ex-friends needing consoling. Soon you'll have busty, insecure girls crying on your shoulder, your arm vanishing into their deep cavernous cleavage.

As one of the first to finish, your score immediately appears on the electronic notice-board. You also see Robin Johnson's name on the board. Though his is in red, his fate sealed by his panic-stricken breakdown. By the end of the day, he'll be a she.

A smile quirked up the corner of his mouth, perhaps he should offer his sympathy, his support... before the rush.
1513.title: As you leave, you the papers are marked. You pa...

15133.content:
Shocked and confused, you gape in horror. Not sure what this means, you feel a hand land on your shoulder. An exam invigilator towers over you. Mutely you point to the board, "Wh... What.. What does that mean?" The dread filling your voice, as you know the answer can't be good.

Your name and mark vanishes from the board, and the rest slide higher filling the gap.

With growling, disapproval, "It means we don't tolerate cheats. If you can't pass the exam without cheating, you're not fit for that."

He gestures to your body, and you find yourself cuddling, comforting yourself. Shrinking lower, you want to protest, need to protest.

"But I didn't cheat!" Even saying the word 'cheat' feels like an admission.

"I didn't." you repeat. "Why... Why do you think... I mean.... I'm one of the first to finish... How... I mean... look at the mark... I didn't need to..." You allow your voice to trail off. If you continue, you'll be sobbing like a girl, overwhelmed by emotions... by the prospect of what you'll become.

As if waiting for your pause, the invigilator walks you passed Robin Johnson. The pleasure you felt at his fate a distant memory. Now, you feel a niggling sense of jealousy. As a cheat, you'll end up with a girlier body, a curvier body, one more suited... only suited for sex. A life lived on your back, with your legs spread.

"You shared too many wrong answers with ..." he looks to a sheet, "Bill Spence, who sat beside you."

"I didn't copy.... I'm finished... You can't label me a cheat, because someone else copied me... I'm the ... I wrote the answers, he copied me."

Your words fall on deaf ears, "You either allowed your answers to be copied, or are complicit in his cheating, in either case..."
15133.title: You see an asterisk appear beside your final mark.

151332.content:
Snatching a hand over your mouth, you know it's useless to resist. The nanites billow and drift, moving with a swarm intelligence that makes you want to run.

The invigilator's grip on the scuff of your neck, too tight. His fingers buried deep in your flesh, you feel blood coming from where his nails are digging in. A thin yowling comes from somewhere else in the hall. Any distraction more than welcome, you turn to see Bill Spence all being marched away.

He squirms more dangling than walking, his toes barely making contact with the floor. A faint cloud hovering around his head, you recognise it as the same kind of swarm darkening your vision. Lungs burning, your air burst free with a huff. Unlocking your grip of your nose, and the palm across your mouth.

Suspecting the grip wasn't proof against the nanites, you gasp a deep breath, the cloud swarm end your tortuous wait, and dive deep inside. Your fingers feel them only as a ticklish caress.

"I didn't cheat.... I wasn't cheating..." you protest, your voice rising higher and higher, "He copied me... He. Copied. Me!"

Hearing how girlish and shrill your voice sounds, you fall silent.

The grip on your neck shifts, as the invigilator adjusts for your changing body. Your feet now struggle to reach the floor. Glancing down as best you can, with the grip around your neck, you see you've already lost a few inches.... and from the shimmying weight on your chest you know exactly where they've ended up.

Breaking your hypnotised gaze from your own nightmarish transformation, your eyes go to Bill. Her bust bouncing heavily as she thrashes about. Already too big, too soon, you hate to think how busty she'll end up.

"Don't worry." The invigilator hissed, "This is the last copying you'll both do."

Sobbing in rasping breaths, each sending worryingly rippling waves of motion across your new bust, tears flow freely down your face. Some of the other students are eyeing you up, as their next conquest. Already forgetting the nerd you were, or the sneak that was Bill.

You're both tossed into the recovery room, as the transformations work your bodies over completely. With too much in flux, your legs don't support you. Flopping like a limp doll, you sprawl over the floor. The nanites now, oozing out through your skin, inflitrating your sweat, you feel them eat away at your last remnants of your masculinity. The clothes are turning to dust, and that dust blowing away. Only one item feels like it's surviving. From the corner of your eye, you see your boxers have feminised, the trace of pink panties... No! a thong now cling to your hips.

Breathing becomes more laboured, as you feel your chest become heavier. Looking up your eyes hunt for the invigilator, surely someone should be around for your rebirth.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/2b/1b/1c/...

Alas, you're far from unique, and you blink away the tears. Eyes hunting about, your neck starts to respond, allowing you some more control. It allows you to spot Bill, her changes just as extreme. She looks joyously happy, or hysterical, you can't quite tell. Her fingers clench and release as she starts to regain control of her body.

You see how developed Bill has become, knowing it's part of the punishment. Bill soon to be Billi, you imagine her dotting her i's with little love hearts. She looks like a bimbo and eager to please.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/46/88/68/...

Moaning softly, you feel pins and needles flash through your body, like racing through a warm shower of rain. Once they pass, you feel everything snapping into alignment once more. Your body, once more yours to control.

Sitting up, you almost heave forward, the weight of your bust, with it's own inertia threatening to topple you.

A sensual grunting moan comes from Billi, and she too struggles into a low crouching seat.

"Apologise, Bitch." you snarl. Your girlish tone filled with vitriol.

Deliberately, she turns slowly until she fully facing you, and winks.

"I wanted this, and I won't apologise."

A triumphant smile beams from her face, "Besides, I think with time and practice, you'll cum to appreciate it too."

Too stunned to take it in, you're frozen in place, as Billi makes her exit proudly naked, with a sway in her hips ready to embrace her future.

A niggling thought at the back of your mind, already teasing the idea.... You will enjoy this?!
151332.title: With a low, soft hiss the air fills with nanite...

151333.content:
You spot a low fog enter the room, from the vents near the floor. A glance towards the invigilator calms you. Surely, they wouldn't change him, too. An amused smile crosses his face, and your calm evaporates. The fog dances over the floor it's movement not quite in line with the laws of physics. Thickening, as it billows around your ankles, you see it waft upwards, climbing your legs.

Flapping your arms through the smoke, and kicking at the white mist fails to help. Tendrils of smoke drift backwards from your fingertips, and the cloud reaches your waist. A tingle works on your feet, a vague sense of pins and needles, as the nanites start their work.

"I think you might like a glimpse towards your future." The invigilator's words snap you out of your panic.

"This is Billi, That's two L's and two i's both dotted with little hearts."

As if waiting for a cue, there's a knock at the door, and moments later Billi slips inside. There's a look of confusion, on her face. The look of those still surprised by their body, still adjusting. She moves with a hip jarring jiggle as she walks. Her chest a bouncing counter-balance,

"Oh Fudge..." she swears, as she slips free from her already loose top. The full swell of her bust slipping out from her too small T-shirt. Her long-fingernails pluck uncertainly at the hem of the T-shirt, before seeing the approving smile of the invigilator. With a man's gaze on her, she giggles coquettishly, and poses to best display her body.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/b3074ea54c20...

The stern invigilator turns his attention back to you, and the sick look of dread on your own face.

The cloud cocooning you from head to toe, you've already surrendered to your fate. You feel a soft breeze as the air shifts in the room. A draught where your trousers, where your own T-shirt should be covering your skin. Resolutely, you know if you look, what you'll see. Hell, now, you even know who you'll see.

Despite your resolution, despite your dread, your gaze darts downwards. You spot the swell of your chest, your fingers run over thighs that are smoother and softer than you've ever felt before... well, with your own legs. The tickling of your spine, has you flicking your head, and you feel the swish of your own long mane of hair.

"We're not entirely without mercy." he announces. Though his attention is more on Billi, as his firm hand on one full ass cheek guides her back from the room, a playful pat sending her on her way.

Perhaps, this is a warning. You think, a lesson to teach you to be more diligent in not having your work copied. The tingling tickling shifts from being internal, to darting over your skin, like the racing feet of ants crawling over your skin.

You want to punch the air in victory, as you see jeans forming up. Just a cuff hanging loose around your ankle, at first. But, before your eyes, the cuff extends upwards, more material forming as you feel your legs covered and contained. As it works past your knees, you have to resist the urge to try and speed up the process, to pull the fragmentary jeans higher.

The tickling tingling also comes from your wrists, and starts working up your arms. Although your slender hands peak from the end of the sleeves, as your petite feet poke from the base of the jeans. You feel confident that once your clothes are restored, your body will surely follow.

Accelerating, you feel the warmth of a sturdy Letterman jacket rest on your shoulders. It even has the right letter for the University you chose. A faint, insecure smile twitches uncertainly at the corners of your mouth. They have your results, and are allowing you in.

Lesson learned....

Lesson learned...

You repeat the mantra inside your head, you're never going to let some cheating bimbo copy your work. Nobody is going to benefit from your hard work. You give the invigilator a stiff nod, to show your understanding, that you've learned your lesson.

Alas, his smile isn't comforting, isn't sharing your understanding.

The intensified tingling of the nanites returns, centred on your chest. A whimper as the girls grow, rising in prominence and size as the nanite go to work. It's not as bad as you feared, you haven't grown. The nanites are working to give you a bra, one appropriate for your new dimensions. Dimensions you'll have for the rest of your life. The hope a delusion, a drowning man ... a drowning woman clutching at straws...

A bow forms in your hair, pulling it into a long loose tail.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/d2dfce1d7333...

Spotting the man in the room, you coo, "Snuggly..." as you turn and give him the best view of your magnificent cleavage. With a gentle roll of your shoulders, you give the girls enough movement to catch his attention.

A warmth deep in your stomach, tells you that you're a good girl. Or rather a naughty girl, if that's what he wants. Underlining your hopes, you gaze, you stare fixedly at his crotch, until he finally get the message, silly boy.

He slowly unbuttons and unzips his trousers, in your need, you help him, the musky aroma driving you wild, as you get nearer and nearer. Your purpose in life defined in flesh, no other thoughts ever trouble your head for the rest of your life.
151333.title: "As fits your crimes, you'll become twins."

choices: It's a prank show up after the adverts.
After the break, it's the Labyrinth team event.
152.content:
Easing yourself into the comfy armchair, you felt the tension leave your muscles, at the end of the day. You check the time, and rub your hands delightedly, as you find it hasn't started. Switching on the TV, and the satellite box, you find channel 496. It's a cheap channel of re-dubbed sports events.

二人の男が入って。。。< br />
"Two men enter...." the voice called out from the tiny, tinny speakers. The original Japanese still audible in the background, and the Japanese titles quickly obscured by blocky English text.

"Tonight on Two men enter, we have a karate fight.", the screen brought up a potted history of each of the combatants, their home-town, their proud families (though with a couple of concerned faces in each group as the camera panned across them). They were both black belts, so you hope it'll be a good fight.

It's a shame if the fight is too one-sided, and over quickly. You enjoy the look on the fighters faces, as the stakes settle in. Their furtive glances to the concerned family members cheering them on.

Taking a sup of your coffee, it's bitter and a bit too strong. But, the bell chimes, as you look over to the kitchen, and the milk in the fridge. With stiff bows, they take their fighting poses. Circling one another, they taking in every movement, every glance.

With a stamping pace, one man advances. Backing away, and blocking, the other's foot slips. The moment, his attention darts to his rival advances, and in seconds it's all over.

On the mat, he still looks stunned, and doubts that it's really happened, "何。。。何。。。何。。ã €‚"

You don't need a translation, as his voice climbs higher and higher, fear replacing confidence, as his body transforms. The gi, starts to hang more loosely on his shifting body, slipping from the narrower shoulders. It reveals the changes vividly for the loser. As her tiny hands reach up, brushing against her new soft chest, and the large breasts hanging there.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/bdf4c752279c...

The camera cuts to her former wife in the crowd, her face crimson with shame, her gaze fixed on the floor. The winner easily helps her to her feet, almost lifting her out of the suit as he did. Only a quickly scrabbling hand grabbing at her trousers threatening to get the show a more adult rating.

The breath huffing from her body, as she's manhandled onto the victor's shoulder. As he turns acknowledging the crowd, do you get the pixellated rear end and butt cleavage that peeks out above the hanging waist of her trousers, as the victor faces each of the four sides. Her plump arse inches from his joyous face.

The screaming commentator calls out the program's full name.

"Two men enter, one man leaves."
152.title: A quiet night relaxing...

choices: Robin arranges to get a shot for the F-virus.
Wandering the flat, she finds Sashra? has robbed her during the night.
Robin jumped, at the rare sound of her land-line phone ringing.
153.content:
Robin woke to a new world. He didn't want to leave the comfort of his bed. The warmth of his duvet, and the reassuring purr of Jess, his cat curled up on the pillow beside him. It had been a long week at work, and he'd earned some peace and quiet. Hell! Even his phone was switched off. With the deal he'd closed last night, Friday night, he knew the welcome he'd get on Monday morning.

A smile flickered over his lips, the corners quirking up as he recalled his luck last night. The gorgeous raven-maned beauty he'd found in the bar the last night. Her boundless enthusiasm, her seemingly endless stamina, and oh boy, those magnificent rippling, rolling breasts.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/8fa7e3884c97...

He had a vague recollection of disturbed sleep, probably Sashra, Sandy, Siobhán? leaving. Just to be sure, he lay there, just focusing on his breathing, the slow steady rhythm, listening for sounds of activity elsewhere in the flat.

No sounds from the bathroom; no showers running, no feet slapping on the cold floor.

No sounds from the kitchen; no microwave turning, no kettle boiling.

But, as wakefulness drew nearer, there were other factors that were starting to intrude, that were starting to demand attention.

Robin's breathing felt ... off. Heavier, harder, as if he'd strained a muscle in last night's activities. A little stretch, a long, warm shower, and a hearty breakfast. Yeah, that felt like the right course of action. The first thing to try. Slipping out from quilt, and careful not to disturb Jess. Robin slipped from his warm cocoon.

The shriek that followed was high, shrill and abundantly feminine. As Robin took in her... abundantly feminine body. Jess lifted a sleepy head, and with a contemptuous look glanced up and down Robin's new body. She was more offended by the loud noise so early in the morning.

"Damned F-Virus." Robin snarled, to..him...herself.

Slipping on a dressing gown, it felt good to be covered up. Though, as she tightened the towelling belt, it did make her very aware of quite how busty her body was. Unbidden, her hands ran over the unfamiliar curves, her tucked in waist, and the expanse of her ass.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/5eb6fe234f31...

Groaning to herself, "Five minutes a woman, and already worried about the size of my ass." she muttered. Though, she did admire the purring, sultry voice that she now possessed.

With a soft groan, she felt how much more mobile and alive her body felt, even with the simple activity of walking to the kitchen. Everything... Everything shimmied, and shook. Her hips felt more mobile, she thought her arse rippled with each planted footstep, and her bust danced like ... like the full bust it was.

"Fuck this." he snarled, her purring tones now taking a sharper edge, "I need coffee. Today, I definitely need it."
153.title: Waking up to a new world.

choices: Robin arranges a visit to the local F-virus clinic.
Robin discovers a message scrawled on the bathroom mirror in lipstick.
Robin looks over her curvy new body, she'll need to find something that fits...
1531.content:
The coffee sloshed from the mug splashing the kitchen table, as a thought occurred to Robin. Feeling her heart thump in her chest, she worried about which variant strain of the F-virus, she'd contracted. Terrified it was a bimbo strain, and that she was taking too long to consider that idea, a squeak of fear slipped out.

She thought back to her university studies.

私は浮気女ではない。

Je ne suis pas une pouffe.

No soy un...una una piruja.

She felt the tension ease, as the words came back to her. The pronunciation a little off, and certainly weird in her feminine tones. But she was fairly sure, she wasn't turning into a giggler.

Checking her reflection in the chrome surface of the kettle, her cleavage loomed large. But she was relieved not to see an Asian face looking back at her. A shudder causing her to pull the dressing gown tighter. A more extreme variant seemed to be spreading there. Both in the form it imposed, and in it's resistance to treatment.

She scanned her tablet and found two of the more recently infected.

The first like herself, wasn't a bimbo strain.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/508f4af2bc6c...

With the sufferer, looking less than happy with things.

The second girl was more worrying, with her posing for the picture. A smile on her face, and her stiff nipples proudly... proudly on display.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/8b3b96c9767d...

It was clearly a bimbo strain of the virus, and Robin doubted, she'd last the course of treatment for her restoration to manhood. Either from simple stupidity, and forgetting to take the pill régime, or from lack of will, with her body proving too... too intoxicating, the pleasures it gives too addictive.

Her slender fingers still shook despite her research, as she arranged her appointment. It was an injection followed by a course of pills that she'd need to take for a fortnight, until she... No! ... until he had fully recovered.
1531.title: Robin arranges to get a shot for the F-virus.

choices: Swallowing nervously, you ask how much it costs for the full week's stay.
You arrange to come home with the pills. You can't afford the time off work.
As you pack in preparation for the taxi to the clinic, you make a discovery.
15311.content:
With Robin's bimbo concerns settled, she called the clinic. A sympathetic sounding woman took her details, and arranged an appointment for 2:00 in the afternoon. She introduced herself as Sandra, and asked for full and honest answers.

Nodding invisibly, she lead Robin through a range of questions. The first being whether she detected any fuzziness in her thoughts, or had she giggled, even for a moment, at her own situation.

Firmly, Robin assured her she didn't have the bimbo strain.

Sandra gave a non-committal grunt in answer. Perhaps doubting Robin's own judgement.

"I haven't ever giggled in my life. Let alone about this." she assured Sandra.

"You're probably right."

"Probably..." Robin answered, her voice rising to shrillness as she interrupted.

"As I say, you're probably right. But there are certain strains where... that appears at a later stage."

"Uh-huh..." Robin answered, not feeling capable of saying more. Her whole world not unsettled once more.

"And do you feel uncomfortable?"

"Well, I'm not used to this bust, or that... -erm- between my legs..." She didn't want to say pussy, as if it would make everything more real.

"Some strains of the F-virus make the sufferers nauseous to wear any clothes. Though a thong can be tolerated, or a simple bikini."

A squeak of surprise slipped from Robin's lips. She had found the dressing gown to be coarser than she liked. A terrified thought chasing away her calm once more.

"I'm... wearing a dressing gown. It's thick and cosy, a warm woollen one." she answered. Not sure why she'd added all the details, was she trying to prove she was still manly, wasn't wearing a diaphanous, silky one?

"That's fine. Then we won't have to arrange for you to be picked up."

"Can you estimate your cup-size?"

"No... But they're quite substantial. They're like as big as my head. They make my shoulders hurt."

"And do you look Asian?"

Robin squeaked once more, "No... It's not that strain. They're not that big." you find yourself imagining the sheer weight, the incredible sensitivity. Horrified at the imagined size of nips as big as that.

"Er... Robin?" Sandra sounds a little uneasy, "Were you originally a woman, or a man?"

"I'm a man." you fight your anger down.

"That's good." Sandra assures you, "For some women, the changes aren't always fully reversed. Leaving some sufferers to have an extra cup size or two, even after the full course of treatments."

Sandra tells you, the course involves an initial injection to destroy the virus, followed by a week long course of pills to help you return to your normal form. She asks if you want to book into the clinic for the entire week, or simply get the injection, and come home with the pills.

She advises staying for the full week, as the pills are absolutely inflexible in their routine. She also warns you that skipping of forgetting to take them even once would render the rest of them useless, and leave you open to re-infection, and without any way to restore your original body.
15311.title: Robin arranges a visit to the local clinic.

choices: You fold the collar up, and gesture for him to just drive.
There's been a change in the law, staying at the clinic is now mandatory.
The mirror message plays on your mind. Who's behind this insult, this assault?
153113.content:
Getting dressed is an adventure, as you slip on your jogging bottoms. They cling to your fuller thighs, making your femininity undeniable. But they're the only things that will accommodate your wider hips and full rear end. The girls jiggle and dance, as you slip on a thick winter jumper. It too, is loose to fit over other clothes, and while the sleeves are long and look oversized, your bust causes it stretch to fit the girls.

Even that simple action has made them stiffen in protest at the friction of the plain fabric. The tightness ensuring that your ripe strawberry sized and coloured nipples distort it, making you look rather ... excitable. Packing a small bag, with the essentials, you make sure you have your wallet for ID, and head for the bathroom. You'll need to tidy your hair, and if you decide to stay your toothbrush and other essentials.

Your bathroom is stylish, and minimalist. A mix of dark, oaken brown, and muted earth tones. But there's a scar of pink, new and unsettling. Your visitor has scrawled a message on the mirror in shocking pink, barbie pink lipstick.

Enjoy the experience, Bitch!!!

You feel your chest heave, your breath catch. You hadn't considered this might be personal, this might be deliberate. Suddenly the world feels more dangerous, you feel more vulnerable and powerless. Your imagination exaggerates every creak, crack and squeak of the house as announcing an intruder.

The phone chimes confirming your appointment, and you stiffle the mousy squeak of surprise. At the clinic you'll be Robin-241, to ensure your anonymity, your privacy.

It chimes again, telling you of the imminent arrival of your taxi. A winter great-coat hangs heavily on your shoulders, almost reaching to sweep the floor. You look like a child dressing in her father's clothes. Or a tramp preparing for winter.

Leaving your home is terrifying, it feels like abandoning your only safe haven. But for a cure, you need to, you steel yourself against your fears.

There's a snort of amusement from the driver, as you get in the back of the taxi. Rather as he reads the destination, an address he recognises.

"Morning... ma'am."

Just enough of a pause, to invite an explanation, to question, without sounding too rude, too inquisitive.
153113.title: As you pack in preparation for the taxi to the ...

choices: "Oh, and there's a crisis, so all our patients are legally required to stay."
"Shit! We have an Asian epidemic, and they send you here." she snorted.
She buzzes for a nurse to take your bloods for analysis.
1531131.content:
You spend the journey grunting a conversation with the driver, as you try to organise the week ahead to minimise your personal contacts.

It's only when the driver clears his throat a second time that you look up and see you've arrived. Paying the driver, you get out and head to the anonymous door. The high blank walls help keep the recovering patients privacy, but do make it feel like a prison.

You feel your own need for that protection. But, the door remains closed, until you flash your screen to the door's camera. A pale red laser scans the barcode, and acknowledges your appointment. It's a solid click that announces the lock sliding aside.

"Please come in..." a friendly human voice invites you in.

You have to close the street door behind you, and you walk forward a few paces to another similar door. Thankfully, you don't have to repeat the process. Though, you wonder how many cameras are watching, ensuring you're not sneaking in another person at the same time.

It's a little surprising, but a friendly garden surrounds the main building, and you see quite a few patients stretching their legs.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/ae35028349b9...

https://68.media.tumblr.com/8e9f7cbd7950...

https://68.media.tumblr.com/16bcd64a09bf...

http://68.media.tumblr.com/2881759b603e2...

Attempting a conversation, you offer up a few 'Hey's and 'Hello's, as you pass. Most grant you a dismissive glance, a couple a snorted hello. But it's the bubbly, giggly 'Hiya...', that truly unsettles you. The grin on her face announcing as loudly as her voice and manner, that she has the bimbo strain. Her words provoking pained looks from the other patients, a look at a nearly shared fate. A close call, that they don't want illustrated any more loudly, or clearly.

You feel a twinge of sympathy as you imagine how much of a strain they're feeling in their shoulders. Cradling your own sumptuous bust, you follow the signs to reception. As you walk, you realise you haven't spotted any others with a non-Asian strain of the F-virus. You appreciate even more how much of a barrier that wall is to escape. You smother a giggle, as you picture them doing cute little bunny-hopping jumps to climb over the wall. Their chests rolling, and heaving in protest, throwing them to the ground with the delayed shifting of their chests.

It makes you feel more self-conscious, as you enter the comfort of the building.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/508f4af2bc6c...


Passing the girl, her scowl at least tells you she's not a giggly, jiggly bimbo. Well, at least, not a bimbo.

Heading straight to the girl at the computer, you introduce yourself as Robin-241, and show her your appointment.

"Can I just get my injection, and course of pills, and I'll get out of your hair...."

You smile, by way of apology in case you sound eager to be off.

She glances up at you, her eyes stopping briefly at your chest, before reaching your face.

"There's an education film, you need to see." Her tone is bored, but firm.
1531131.title: You fold the collar up, and gesture for him to ...

choices: You get Rose's story as you walk.
You discover the cure, isn't a 100% effective.
Watching Rose's juicy, jiggling bust, a giggle slips out. Cut off with a gasp.
15311313.content:
"We need to take a blood sample to confirm your self-diagnosis, and you need to watch the recording to know what to expect from the treatment, and any side-effects you might experience."

A shadow heaves into view, and you find your seated view blocked, by an imposing sight.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/23a37e2b181b...

"This is Rose: One of our inma..., one of your fellow patients."

As you reach for your phone, the nurse/receptionist takes your hand, and proficiently slips your ID band onto your wrist. Spinning it you see Robin-241, and a long barcode.

"Room 32." She informs you, patting your hand.

"For my bloods?"

"And the video, too." Rose adds.

"That, needs a room."

"It's precautionary, until you're cleared from some of the more contagious strains, or bimbo influences."

Glancing at her screen, she reviews your data.

"No offence, but we can't trust your opinion."

Her breath hissing inward through her clenched teeth, "You're staying here, until we clear you."

"I'll show you the way." Rose volunteers.
15311313.title: She buzzes for a nurse to take your bloods for ...

choices: With a sigh you settle down to watch the video. It should answer some questions.
A knock at the door announces the arrival of the nurse.
Your skin prickles, and you wonder... worry about cross-contamination.
153113132.content:
As you walk, Rose chatters away. You listen half-interestedly, nodding enough to follow, but it's not about the treatment and your cure. Beside, the rhythmic bounce of her bust, is distracting. The pair of you turn a corner, and you pass a girl lounging on plush leather sofa. She looks unhappy, which you can understand giving that she's suffering from the Asian strain of the F-virus. Nodding a hello to her, you walk past without talking.

https://68.media.tumblr.com/c97b9d909559...

Glad that the clinic is well funded, and your policy allows you to be here, you're glad you didn't skimp. Rose turns back towards you as she reaches the next turn in the corridor. You spot the more thoughtful look on her face, and realise she's also stopped her constant narrative.

Following her round the corner, Rose lowers her voice. "Bill just discovered she has the resistant strain. She'll be here for the rest of the week, until she's not contagious, and then she's free to face the world. But, it'll be in that body."

The nervousness, the empathy, the fear of the same fate is clear in Rose's voice as she talks.

"Bill?..." you ask softly, perhaps it's short for Billi.

Rose doesn't answer, but she does give a curt, sad nod.

"This is your room." With a swipe of the magnetic card, the door opens to reveal a nice room. It looks like it belongs in a hotel rather than a hospital or a clinic.

She waves for you to enter, and passes you the magnetic card. Your breasts collide as you slip past her, Rose's chest bouncing heavily, while your smaller bust almost throw you around, as it danced more wildly.

"The nurse will be with you shortly." she continues as if it never happened.

Taking a tour of the room, you see the bathroom is quite spacious. To accommodate the bigger girls you imagine, and the bed is a double, probably for the same reason. You see the TV on the wall,

It's all done in a bit of a daze. You hadn't imagined the treatment not working, you never thought of having to live out your life ... in this body. Swallowing you try not to focus on it. Turning back to the door, it offers no answers, as you now bubble with questions. How effective is the cure?, how infectious are you?, and why were you deliberately infected?

Slumping dejectedly to sit on the edge of the bed. Your bust tugs heavily at your shoulders a mocking reminder of your current predicament.
153113132.title: You discover the cure, isn't a 100% effective.

choices: Robin waited, wanting to, needing to explain who he really was....
Panic gripped her, and Robyn fled the house.
Snatching up some clothes, Robyn raced to meet them at the door.
1533.content:
"Shit..." she grumbled, scowling at the shrill handset. "Last fucking thing..." The caller ID, marked as 'Withheld', wasn't promising either.

Even just reaching for it, Robin was too aware of her new bust, that shifted and shimmied. Those big ol' titties might be fun to watch, but she was already tired of carrying them about. Rolling her shoulders, the girls forced the belt lower on her dressing gown, giving her a bigger display of cleavage.

The phone kept insisting on her attention, as she juggled the handset, and tugging at the belt with her free hand. The gown just ran over her flesh, refusing to tighten or hide that huge bust from her sight. Instead, the brushing cloth just reminded her of the equally sumptuous ass she was carrying behind her.

Scowling she dropped into the sofa. A hiss of pain spilling from her lips, as her chest bounced and settled heavily.

"Yes." she snarled, finally answering the phone.

"Last chance to leave, bitch." The cold voice told her from the other end.

"You're behind this...." Still a little slow-witted from waking, it was as much a question as an accusation.

"Yes, I hope you can adjust to your new life, Robyn."

The voice... Sashra, was familiar, even if the name still eluded her. Robin picked up on the subtle difference, in his name, hearing the feminine edge given to her ... his name.

"Why would I leave?"

"Thieves generally don't stay, once the police are on the way...." The explanation coming in a lilting voice, amused by her question.

"Robin's out of the country at the moment, and you're just an opportunist thief.... or whore... or whatever..."

A chill raced down Robin's spine, if she wasn't believed.... If this wasn't treated as an infection. Her heart raced, as she heard the sound of police sirens getting closer.

Looking around his apartment, Robin saw the chaos wasn't just the usual after-party disorder. There was a genuine mess. A quick trip back to the bedroom, revealed an space where a large suitcase had sat. The drawer beneath missing the passport, the bedside drawer missing his wallet, and various pieces of identification.

Seeing how he'd been set up, Robin assumed, a flight had been booked, and other evidence planted. A whimper spilling from her throat, as she imagined things planted not to suggest Robin had gone, but to suggest, she was a whore. Her cheeks burned at the idea of 'her' condoms... the thought of drugs... 'party drugs', for a party girl, made Robyn queasy, being processed as a woman, treated... dismissed as a woman.

The sirens were definitely closer now, and still coming.
1533.title: Robin jumped, at the sound of her phone ringing.

choices: Checking his remaining funds as he trudges to his room.
A surprise guest waits for Greg in his room.
With a groan, verging on a scream, Greg realised he'd lost his passport!
154.content:
Greg was feeling sluggish, and slow-witted, as he struggled back towards consciousness. But, a smile still cracked his face, as he recalled the events of the previous night.

A spear of pain lashing through his temple, as the variety of drinks surged back into his recollection. Blurred faces of the various bar girls, throwing themselves at him. Patting his wallet, eyes still screwed shut, it felt lighter but (to be honest) he was surprised it was still there.

The smile faltered, as he remembered puking his guts a few times during the night, too. Beneath his back, the stiff wooden sun-lounger was starting to make his back ache worse. The soft warmth of the Sun, gentle enough to wake him, and keep him on the verge of dozing.

Squinting against the Sun, Greg looked around. The bar was empty, hell, the beach only having a few early visitors, hoiday makers catching the sunrise, some locals walking their dogs, and a few harried men in light suits heading to work.

It was a complete change of scenery, a break from Greg's past, the local script entirely beyond his comprehension.

ทางนี้ไปยังชายหาด{/ b}

It was a beautiful script, and with a struggle he could communicate. The bar was part of a new resort, in a new locale. The workers not up to the English proficiency he'd found in the capital. But the women... the women were every inch as gorgeous, and 'getting by' was easy enough with their simple goals.

'Laid Off', the reality landed with a crash, as the disastrous reason for his break made him groan on the lounger. Muscles aching, Greg sat forward, pain and how he strained those muscles coming back.

Had he had a threesome? a foursome? The memories were there, but tantalisingly jumbled.

It wasn't a long walk back to the hotel, and he walked with a jaunty sway, whistling tunelessly to himself. A comfy bed, to rest properly, and some proper rehydration was what he needed.

"Good Morning, Mister Wallace."

The receptionist greeted him as he passed. Her English, accented, stilted and slow. The polite smile on her face, and the formal slight bow, just part of her welcome. Perhaps it was guilt, but had he read some disapproval on her features. Last night was hardly a quiet affair, discrete not a word that'd apply.

The slight, firm bounce of her bust as she straightened drew Greg's eye to the part of the scenery that he most enjoyed.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/df6e276bfdf6...

Surassa's front faltering, her insecurity visible, she composes herself trying to pretend she's not been obvious ogled by a half-drunk guest. She picked up a stray flower, and tucked it in her hair.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/a147a929bc70...

Her smile definitely in a lower gear, he offered a vague muttered apology. Surassa's incomprehension was still clear, either his weak voice, sore throat, or meant they parted with a formality.

Going up the stairs, Greg found an itch that needed scratching as he walked.

"Hope I didn't catch anything..." he grumbled to himself as he climbed the stairs.
154.title: Happy Holidays?

choices: Greg missed the friendly wave one gave, as he turned away.
Falling asleep, he wondered if the first had had a familiar face.
Greg found the itch intensifying as he retreated inside.
1541.content:
Feeling the pull of his bed, the stairs feeling longer and more tiring than necessary. The window to the balcony stands wide, and stifling a yawn, you take some of the air.

His gaze drifts down to that sun lounger, and your foggy memories of last night. Surely, if some detail can spring back into focus, he can have some pleasant dreams to take him through the heat of the day, with a nice siesta.... or whatever they call it here.

But, it's a hyper-inflated woman who wanders into sight. The memories might be vague, and indistinct, but he'd recall a beauty as busty as her. Though if she threw herself at him, he doubted he'd resist ... too hard.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/7aa1cab33ca3...

She looked oddly uncomfortable, tugging awkwardly at her top. An idea occurred to Greg, and he nodded to himself as it made sense.

She was infected, the F-virus was rampant in this part of the world, and those curves were far beyond anything nature could develop.

From this distance, the temptation was merely voyeuristic, and he wouldn't risk infection. The second beauty emerged from beneath the trees, startling Greg.

https://66.media.tumblr.com/1a9d6d4deefb...

Every inch as top-heavy, and looking a more familiar with her curves, she was a greater temptation.

"Damn..." he muttered to himself, imagining the Tit-wank those beauties could deliver. Another yawn sent Greg back into the shade of the room, the heat and humidity adding to his fatigue.

They'd fill his dreams, even if they weren't part of his original blurry recollection.
